A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If possible\, I would give it zero stars. 

It was a beautiful film. 

Dozens of plot holes. I question if Rian Johnson has ever seen a Starwars Film before because this was not one. 

It was painfully slow paced\, it didn't make sense how this happened more moments after TFA\, characters choices didn't make sense. 

It was trash.
